alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 1:27PM EDT until April 27 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... South central Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 100 PM CDT. * At 1226 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles west of Perdido Beach to 4 miles south of Orange Beach, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pensacola, Brent, West Pensacola, Warrington, Orange Beach, Goulding, Lillian, Myrtle Grove, Perdido Beach, Elberta and Pensacola Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
